common.chooseImageInfo: Choose a profile picture for the client. Recommended size: 400x400px

client.title: Client Management
client.subtitle: Manage your veterinary clients and their information
client.searchClient: Search clients by name or email...
client.createFirstClient: Create your first client to get started

messages.title: Messages
messages.subtitle: Messaging
messages.messageContent: Access and manage all messages that have been claimed by you. Click the action icon to view message details.
messages.noPermission: You do not have permission to join this consultation

services.title: Service Categories
services.subtitle: Manage service categories for your practice
services.createNewCategoryContent: Create a new category to organize your veterinary services
services.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the category and what services it includes
services.categoryNameHelp: Choose a clear, descriptive name for your service category. This will help clients easily identify the type of services offered.
services.descriptionHelp: Provide additional details about what types of services are included in this category. This helps both staff and clients understand the scope of services.
services.tipContent: Good category names are: "Emergency Care", "Preventive Medicine", "Surgical Services", etc.
services.serviceNameHelp: The name should be short and descriptive (3-5 words) as it appears when clients select services.
services.serviceDescriptionHelp: Provide detailed information about your service. Additional features can be added in the Features section below.
services.categoriesHelp: Organize your services by category to help clients find what they need quickly.
services.communicationTypeHelp: Choose how you'll communicate with clients. This setting cannot be changed after creation.
services.durationHelp: Specify the expected length of the appointment or consultation.
services.onDemandServiceHelp: Allows clients to select from 4 different time slots starting from now. All staff members will be notified and can accept the appointment.
services.servicePriceHelp: Set to $0 for free services. Any amount above $0 requires clients to provide payment details when booking.
services.taxCalculationHelp: Enter the tax percentage to be added to the service charge.
services.addressRequirementHelp: Clients must provide their address when booking an appointment or sending a message.
services.phoneRequirementHelp: Clients must provide their phone number when booking an appointment or sending a message.
services.allEmployeesHelp: Select this option to allow all employees to be booked for this service. If unchecked, you can choose specific employees for this service.
services.intakeQuestionsDescription: Create custom questions that clients must answer before booking a consultation
services.question: Question
services.publicBookingHelp: Enabling this allows clients to book this service. If disabled, only clinic employees can book this service.
services.homepageFeatureHelp: Enabling this will display the service on your homepage.
services.featuresDescription: Add a fine-grain list of specific features for this service.
services.createServiceDescription: Set up a new veterinary service offering for your clients
